Description: BigIQ Template for use with F5 FPS labs https://clouddocs.f5.com/training/community/

Label.default: For First Accept BIG-IQ BYOL Terms and Conditions and note Image ID [v6.x.latest]
Check "Outputs" for setup details after completion

BigIqAdminPassword.default: Big-IQ setup Admin password for GUI/Web Access

VPC.ConstraintDescription: This must be an existing VPC within the working region.

CustomImageId.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid AMI Id
CustomImageId.Description: Please specify the a v6.x.latest AMI Id that you have Agreed to T&Cs [default=6.0.1 N.Virginia]

InstanceType.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid EC2 instance type for BIG-IQ
InstanceType.Description: Size of the F5 BIG-IQ Instance |'m4.2xlarge' has 8 cores, 32Gb RAM @~50cents/hour

licenseKey1.Description: F5 BIG-IQ Central Manager license key

licenseKey2.Description: F5 BIG-IQ Logging Node license key

BigIqAdminPassword.Description: Big-IQ setup Admin password for GUI/Web Access

UserIP.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
UserIP.Description: The IP address range used to SSH and access managment GUI on the EC2 instances

sshKey.Description: Key pair for accessing the instance. See, https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/ec2-key-pairs.html

ManagementSubnet.ConstraintDescription: The subnet ID must be within an existing VPC

DataPlaneSubnet.ConstraintDescription: The subnet ID must be within an existing VPC
DataPlaneSubnet.Description: Internal Subnet - used for data transfer

CmManagementIP.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid IP in the form x.x.x.x
CmManagementIP.Description: CM Management IP - Lab Default is 10.1.1.249

CmDataPlaneIP.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid IP in the form x.x.x.x
CmDataPlaneIP.Description: CM DataPlane IP - Lab Default is 10.1.20.249

DcdManagementIP.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid IP in the form x.x.x.x
DcdManagementIP.Description: DCD Management IP - Lab Default is 10.1.1.248

DcdDataPlaneIP.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid IP in the form x.x.x.x
DcdDataPlaneIP.Description: DCD DataPlane IP - Lab Default is Internal vlan 10.1.20.248

TimeZone.Description: Olson TimeZone string from /usr/share/zoneinfo eg: America/Los_Angeles
